track.name: Ralphie What do you Want For Christmas
track.source: stories/CS/Ralphie What Would you Like for Christmas.mp3

objective.name: Jake in the Box - Open Gate

clue.name: Crank it
clue.text: Make sure to face your fears, Ralphie! (There's something off about that Jack-in-the-Box...)

clue.name: Equations
clue.text: Be mindful of addition or subtraction! (The numbers will only fall into place if you solve the full equation...)

clue.name: Halfsies
clue.text: 7 __ __ 3 (Solve the full equationsand put those digits in order from left to right!)

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: How strange...That's not how I remember the alphabet! Is it missing something?

clue.name: Extra Assist
clue.text: The alphabet on the wall is missing some letters - which letters, though?? Maybe they spell something out!

clue.name: Presents
clue.text: What do those kids want for Christmas? Miss Shields had them write papers on it! Maybe Ralphie can use those to practice his cursive.

clue.name: Spell it Out
clue.text: Take a look at the underlined letters - Do they spell something out?

clue.name: Lock Assist
clue.text: SANTA is correct! Line the letters up to the Master Notches on the front of the lock, and pull down to open!

clue.name: How Many??
clue.text: How many unicorns are there? How many balls? Practice your counting with the toys show on the cork board!

clue.name: Halfsies
clue.text: "2 __ 4 __ 3" The pictures on the board will give you the order of toys. Count up how many of those toys you can find - Unicorns, Balls, etc.

clue.name: Balls
clue.text: Although that picture only shows a basketball, you'll need to count ALL of the balls in the drawer!

clue.name: Trucks
clue.text: Make sure to only count the trucks and not ALL of the cars!

clue.name: Lock Help
clue.text: The mailbox lock is tricky - be sure to line your code up to the MASTER notches.

clue.name: Lock Assist
clue.text: Your code is correct! Line the digits up to the Master Notches on the front of the lock, and pull down to open!

objective.name: Dress Randy - GAME MASTER REMOTE TRIGGER

clue.name: Dress The Boy
clue.text: Poor Randy - he's never going to stay warm like that! Make sure you bundle him up properly!

clue.name: Present The Boy
clue.text: Please present Randy to the camera! We have to make sure he's dressed well enough to stay warm!

objective.name: Tongue on Flagpole - Drop the Flag

clue.name: Triple-Dog-Dare
clue.text: I triple - dog - dare you to put that tongue on the pole!

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: That tongue has magnets on one side of it-attach it to the pole on the tongue outline!

clue.name: Move 'em
clue.text: You can move those tires to be able to look at them on all sides.

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: Once your tires are set, rotate them all at the same time to see the word spelled out on the other side!

clue.name: FUUuuu...
clue.text: Ralphie says something naughty in A Christmas Story - the movie censors it out with a holiday treat! (F _ _ _)

clue.name: Lock Assist
clue.text: FUDGE is correct! Line the letters up to the Master Notches on the front of the lock, and pull down to open!

clue.name: Missing Numbers
clue.text: Take a look inside those hats - you're missing an important detail!

clue.name: Characters
clue.text: If you're not sure which hat goes on which hook, there's picture frames of the characters with their names!

clue.name: Matching
clue.text: Match each hat to each character using the labeled picture. Hang each hat on the correct hook to get the order of your next code.

clue.name: Fanatics
clue.text: Let's see if you know your Christmas Story trivia! What year was the movie released?

clue.name: Door Help
clue.text: 1983 is correct! Be sure to hit the lock button after inputting the numbers to open up that door!

clue.name: Find the Tiles
clue.text: There are 8 tiles hidden throughout the room, to go with the tile already mounted on top of the furnace.

clue.name: Matching
clue.text: Match those colored tiles colored tiles to the picture on top of the furnace! The orientation doesn't matter, just the placement!

clue.name: Orientation
clue.text: Make sure you orient that color block clue the correctly! Use the only furnace tile stuck in place as your guide.

clue.name: Aligning Pipes
clue.text: Don't worry about aligning those pipes! Simply place the correct colors into the correct spots.

clue.name: Orientation
clue.text: Look at the note of lights with the tips pointing upwards!

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: What an interesting light pattern on the tree! Maybe counting the flashes of each color will help...

clue.name: Ultra Assist
clue.text: Count the flashes of each color on the tree! The number of flashes will give you the digits - the light bulb note gives you the order!

clue.name: Push
clue.text: The old man loves doing the daily newspaper crossword every morning! The issue seems to be the author's last names...

clue.name: Numbered
clue.text: Those last names are numbered! Author #1 will go in the 1. spot on the crossword, and so on...

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: Make sure you have all those last names correct and in the right places on the crossword! The red-highlighted boxes will give you a word.

clue.name: Ultra Assist
clue.text: VICTOR is correct! Those letters have to be useful somehow! Now that I think of it - wasn't there a directional guide with letters on it?

clue.name: ALL THE HELP
clue.text: If V is the first red highlighted letter, and V is 3 to the Left on the letter guide, then 3 Lefts will be your first input into the directional lock! Continue this pattern for the rest of your letters.

clue.name: Fanatics
clue.text: Do you remember the name of the Lone Rider's nephew's horse? Starts with a V...

clue.name: LOCK RESET
clue.text: Reset the lock by pushing the silver bars into the body of the lock twice. It helps if you aren't pulling on the lock as you input the directions!

clue.name: Books at School
clue.text: Did you leave your books at school again, Ralphie?

clue.name: Delay
clue.text: Once you've set the clock, it may take a few moments for your next clue.

clue.name: Correct Time
clue.text: Make sure your clock is set to the correct time. Check the roman numeral guide on the back if you're not sure!

clue.name: How-To
clue.text: Use the small wheel on the back to adjust the hands of the clock!

clue.name: Lock Assist
clue.text: OVLTN is correct! Line the letters up to the Master Notches on the front of the lock, and pull down to open!

clue.name: Closer Look
clue.text: Take a closer look ad for your prized BB gun...Is there anything on it that could be useful, like a phone number?

clue.name: Assist
clue.text: Your phone number will have two letters and five numbers. Are there any on that ad that stand out to you?

clue.name: Answer
clue.text: Your phone number is PL6-1200. Be sure to dial the phone properly, rotating the dial all the way to the stopper for each number!

clue.name: Answer Assist
clue.text: Place your finger into the hole of the number you would like to enter, then rotate dial all the way until you reach the silver stopper- continue this for each input!

objective.name: ALL 4 Stocking Hung - GAME MASTER REMOTE TRIGGER

clue.name: BB GUN FINISH
clue.text: Make sure you tell us what you want for Christmas, Raphie! All together, loud and clear!

actions.action: You Won! You Won You Won You Won!

event.name: Stockings up-What do you want for Christmas?

action.source: stories/CS/Ralphie What Would you Like for Christmas.mp3

actions.action: Ralphie, what would you like for Christmas?
